articles.description: Experts predict that the market in 2024 will be impacted by election outcomes, domestic capex traction, inflation rates, and potential recessions in the euro area and the United States.
articles.content: The Indian economy shone brightly as a standout performer in 2023 amid elevated interest rates, persistent inflation, weakening demand, and geopolitical tensions, while numerous other major economies… [+6753 chars]
